item.title: Deepak Chopra Explains How to Find the Leader Within
item.description:
Deepak Chopra Explains How to Find the Leader Within

BNET Editor-in-Chief Eric Schurenberg talks to "The Soul of Leadership" author Deepak Chopra about how to reveal the visionary leader inside us all. Learn what questions you need to answer to help tap your own potential and hear his take on why Apple and Nike have become such business greats.

item.title: Dr. Deepak Chopra: "Spiritual Solutions" | Talks at Google
item.description:
Dr. Deepak Chopra: "Spiritual Solutions" | Talks at Google

In his latest book, Spiritual Solutions, Dr. Deepak Chopra explains how many of life's challenges can best be addressed from a spiritual perspective. "The secret is that the level of the problem is never the level of the solution," he writes.

item.title: Deepak Chopra - How to Attract your soulmate ?
item.description:
Deepak Chopra - How to Attract your soulmate ?

Deepak Chopra - How to Attract your soulmate ? The first secret to attracting a profound lover or soul mate into your life is to fully embrace, love and accept yourself just as you are. Loving you, with all of your flaws, frailties and insecurities turns you into a powerful manifesting magnet.

item.title: Deepak Chopra on Creating Your Soul Profile | Oprah's Lifeclass | Oprah Winfrey Network
item.description:
Deepak Chopra on Creating Your Soul Profile | Oprah's Lifeclass | Oprah Winfrey Network

Deepak Chopra tells Traci, a woman serving time at Rockville Correctional Facility in Indiana, how becoming self-aware can help her break free from her spiritual prison. Plus, Deepak shares the meaningful questions you need to ask yourself to discover who you really are and create a soul profile.

item.title: Deepak chopra - Spiritual Solutions for a Sustainable Economy
item.description:
Deepak chopra - Spiritual Solutions for a Sustainable Economy

Deepak chopra - Spiritual Solutions for a Sustainable Economy As a physician, teacher, and bestselling author, Deepak Chopra has received thousands of questions like these: Can a stagnant career be jump-started? In a world full of stress, how does one find time for meditation? How do I lead a fulfilling life?

item.title: Deepak Chopra: The 13th Disciple, a spiritual adventure
item.description:
Deepak Chopra: The 13th Disciple, a spiritual adventure

Deepak's book The 13th Disciple is a fictioned based spiritual adventure. In this interview with Alan Steinfeld he talks about the periiel wisdom behind the book and the spiritual teachings of "I am." I am the way, the truth and the light." This is the I am presence is inside all of us.
